name: edit_file
description: Perform an exact string replacement in a file. The old_string must match exactly (including whitespace and indentation). For multiple replacements, set replace_all to true.

file_path.description: Absolute path to the file to edit.

old_string.description: The exact string to find and replace.

replace_all.description: If true, replace all occurrences. If false (default), the old_string must appear exactly once.
